protocol_name: Manual dissection of the Schistosoma mansoni head and back end for transcriptomic analysis
protocol_name_html: Manual dissection of the Schistosoma mansoni head and back end for transcriptomic analysis
description: Total genomic DNA was extracted from leaf tissue to amplify and sequence individually five specific target loci from nuclear and chloroplast genome.
manuscript_citation: Ley AC, Nissen J, Wölk A, Röser M (2018) Glacial refugia and speciation in a group of wind-pollinated and -dispersed, endemic Alpine species of Helictotrichon (Poaceae). PLoS ONE 13(10): e0205354. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0205354

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"434na","text":"Total genomic DNA was extracted from leaf tissue using the NucleoSpin\u00aePlant-Kit (Macherey-Nagel, D\u00fcren, Germany) following the manufacturer\u2019s instructions.\u00a0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cq9nt","text":"Amplification of the target loci were was conducted in a Mastercycler (Eppendorf, Hamburg, Germany). Each 20 \u03bcl volume contains 2.00 \u03bcl 10\u00d7 PCR buffer (without MgCl2), 1.00 \u03bcl DMSO, 0.20 \u03bcl 100 mM dNTPs, 1.4 \u03bcl 50 mM MgCl2, 0.20 \u03bcl 0.05 mM each forward and reverse primers, 0.20 \u03bcl Taq DNA polymerase (BioTherm DNA polymerase 5 u\/\u03bcl from GeneCraft, L\u00fcdinghausen, Germany), 1 to 2 \u03bcl genomic DNA extract and filled up with H2O. Amplification cycles were as follows: one cycle of 3 min at 94\u00b0C, 35 cycles of 30 s at 94\u00b0C, 30 s at 50\u00b0C, 1.5 min at 72\u00b0C with a final extension period of 10 min at 72\u00b0C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3huru","text":"PCR products were sequenced by LGC Genomics (Berlin, Germany).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e7vrd","text":"Sequences were edited and then aligned manually (after preliminary automatic alignment in MUSCLE [23]) with the program Geneious 4.8.3 (http:\/\/www.geneious.com [24]).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a40t9","text":"Three chloroplast and one nuclear marker were amplified.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2nqtb","text":" GTA CTT C [46] trnL (UAG) CTG CTT CCT AAG AGC AGC GT [46] ycf3ln1 ycf3ln1-F TGA CAG ATC ACG GCC ATA TT [47] ycf3ln1-R TTA YAG AGA TGG TGC GAT TT [47] ycf3ln2 ycf3ln2-F GCY TGT TTC CAA TAC TCA GCA [47]
